sentences.en: Even lupus Kinfolk gather in tightly knit packs.
sentences.cn: 即使狼亲属也被收入结构严密的组织.

sentences.en: Half - blooded children are known as Kinfolk.
I sent my other son to the country to stay with kinfolk.
sentences.cn: 我把另一个儿子送到乡下和亲戚住在一起。

sentences.en: Kinfolk come to see Yvonne by the dozen.
Kinfolk don't receive much coddling, however.
sentences.cn: 无论如何,亲属不会受到溺爱.

sentences.en: Poor Emily. Her kinsfolk should come to her.
sentences.cn: 可怜的埃米莉，她的亲属应该到她这儿来。

sentences.en: The Silver Fangs borrowed many traditions from their noble Kinfolk.
sentences.cn: 银牙从他们的贵族亲属那里借鉴了很多的传统.

sentences.en: Their Kinfolk have been forced out of their homelands repeatedly, sometimes dragged away in chains.
sentences.cn: 他们的亲属三番五次的被逐离故乡, 有几次甚至是被枷锁捆着带走的.

sentences.en: They might have even been born to two Kinfolk parents far from a sept.
sentences.cn: 也有的是不同氏族的两个亲属的孩子.

trans.tran_en: Your kinfolk or kinsfolk are the people who are related to you
